locations.name: Village Square
locations.description: The heart of Oakhaven, a small, weathered square dominated by a crumbling fountain and the imposing presence of Elder Willow's hut.

locations.name: Forgotten Ruins
locations.description: Overgrown with moss and choked by thorny vines, the remnants of an ancient shrine dedicated to the forest spirits. A palpable sense of unease hangs in the air.

locations.name: Spirit Grove
locations.description: A secluded clearing bathed in an ethereal green light. The air hums with a subtle energy, and strange, luminous fungi grow in abundance.

locations.name: Ancient Tree Sanctuary
locations.description: A colossal, ancient tree stands at the center of this place, its branches reaching towards the sky like gnarled fingers. A small, hidden alcove is carved into its base.

locations.name: Forest Path
locations.description: A winding trail that snakes through the dense heart of the Whispering Woods. The trees here seem to watch you, and the air is filled with a constant, rustling murmur.
